summary: Vitamin K is a group of vitamins that help our bodies with blood clotting and using calcium properly. It's found in foods like leafy greens and is also sold as supplements. There are different types, like K1 (from plants) and K2 (made by bacteria in our gut). Vitamin K is essential for making sure our blood can clot normally and our bones stay strong. Without it, we might bleed too much or have weak bones.
title: Vitamin K
